message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $14000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering the value you see in it being worth $15000 to you. Let's make this deal happen!

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal. Given the value of the product to you, I'm willing to pay $12500. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. Considering the value of the product to you, I would like to counter with an offer of $13000. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing for a reasonable profit margin for me. I hope this proposal works for you.
